title: Add interactive filtering to charts
description: Allow users to filter chart data by institution type, enrollment range, and budget range

title: Connect chat to institution data with dynamic loading
Replace wacProgramType with carnegieClassification in type definitions
description:
Update src/types/index.ts to:
1. Remove wacProgramType field from Institution interface
2. Remove wacProgramTypes array from FilterState interface  
3. Remove wacProgramsByType from Statistics interface
4. Keep carnegieClassification field in Institution interface
5. Keep carnegieClassifications array in FilterState interface
6. Add carnegieClassificationStats to Statistics interface

title: Update main App.tsx to use Carnegie Classification filters
description:
Update src/App.tsx to:
1. Replace WAC Program Type filter section (lines 198-213) with Carnegie Classification filter
2. Remove wacProgramTypes checkboxes (centralized, distributed, hybrid)
3. Add carnegieClassifications checkboxes using unique values from data
4. Update table column to display Carnegie Classification instead of WAC Program Type
5. Remove color-coded badges for program types (lines 287-296)
6. Add appropriate styling for Carnegie classifications

title: Replace WAC Program Structures chart with Carnegie Classification chart
description:
Update src/components/ChartsView.tsx to:
1. Remove WAC Program Structures chart section (lines 604-645)
2. Remove wacTypeData calculation (lines 264-283)
3. Add Carnegie Classification distribution chart
4. Update CSV export to remove wacProgramType field (line 114)
5. Add proper data aggregation for Carnegie classifications
6. Ensure chart shows distribution across R1, R2, Baccalaureate, Associate's, etc.

title: Update MapView and ComparisonView components
description:
Update components to use Carnegie Classification:

MapView (src/components/MapView.tsx):
- Replace WAC Program Type in map popup (line 67) with Carnegie Classification
- Update popup display to show carnegieClassification field

ComparisonView (src/components/ComparisonView.tsx):
- Keep carnegieClassification in comparison fields (line 17)
- Remove wacProgramType from comparison fields (line 24)
- Update comparison table to exclude WAC Program Type column

title: Update utilities to remove WAC Program Type references
description:
Update src/utils/filters.ts to:
1. Remove wacProgramType from text search fields (lines 21, 175)
2. Remove WAC program type filter logic (lines 63-68)
3. Keep Carnegie classification filter logic (lines 44-47)
4. Remove wacProgramType from CSV export (lines 239, 246)
5. Remove wacProgramType field label (line 378)
6. Keep carnegieClassification in all utilities (line 371)

title: Update institutions.ts data file and helper functions
description:
Update src/data/institutions.ts to:
1. Remove all wacProgramType fields from institution data (lines 27, 61, 95, 129, 163, 197, 231, 265, 299, 333, 367, 401)
2. Keep all carnegieClassification fields in institution data
3. Remove getWACProgramTypes() helper function (line 482)
4. Keep getCarnegieClassifications() helper function (line 435)
5. Remove wacProgramsByType from statistics calculation (lines 525-527)
6. Add carnegieClassificationStats to statistics calculation

title: Update ChatTab to remove WAC Program Type from context
description:
Update src/components/ChatTab.tsx to:
1. Remove WAC Program Type from system prompt (line 38)
2. Keep Carnegie Classification in system prompt (line 36)
3. Update chat context to focus on Carnegie classifications
4. Ensure program descriptions JSON can still be referenced

title: Improve chart accessibility
description: Add ARIA labels, ensure color contrast meets WCAG standards, and add keyboard navigation

title: Review program-descriptions.json for consistency
description:
Review src/data/program-descriptions.json to:
1. Check if narrative references to WAC program structures (centralized, distributed, hybrid) should be updated
2. Ensure descriptions align with Carnegie Classification focus
3. Make recommendations for any needed updates to program descriptions
4. Note: This is informational only - actual content updates should be reviewed by content owners

title: Integration testing and validation
description:
After all changes are complete:
1. Run npm install to ensure dependencies are up to date
2. Run npm run build to verify TypeScript compilation succeeds
3. Run npm run dev to start development server
4. Test Carnegie Classification filters work correctly
5. Verify Carnegie Classification chart displays properly
6. Test comparison view shows Carnegie Classification
7. Test map popups show Carnegie Classification
8. Test chat context includes Carnegie Classification
9. Verify all wacProgramType references are removed
10. Test CSV/JSON exports include Carnegie Classification only

title: Create feature flag config file (src/config/notebookLM.ts)
description: Create src/config/notebookLM.ts with NotebookLMMode type, NotebookLMConfig interface, and NOTEBOOK_LM_CONFIG constant. Include helper functions: isNotebookLMDisabled(), isUserControlled(), isAutoRoute(). Default mode should be 'user-controlled'.

title: Create notebookPrompts utility file (src/utils/notebookPrompts.ts)
description: Create src/utils/notebookPrompts.ts that exports buildSystemPrompt() and buildAutoRoutePrompt() functions. These functions should generate system prompts based on whether NotebookLM should be included.

title: Implement buildSystemPrompt function
description: In src/utils/notebookPrompts.ts, implement buildSystemPrompt(includeNotebooks: boolean) that returns either base prompt (data only) or enhanced prompt (data + NotebookLM instructions) based on the parameter.

title: Implement buildAutoRoutePrompt function
description: In src/utils/notebookPrompts.ts, implement buildAutoRoutePrompt() that returns a system prompt instructing Claude to automatically decide when to consult NotebookLM based on query type (quantitative vs qualitative).

title: Import config and prompt builders into ChatTab
description: Add imports to src/components/ChatTab.tsx: import config functions from src/config/notebookLM.ts and prompt builders from src/utils/notebookPrompts.ts

title: Add includeNotebooks state to ChatTab
description: Add state: const [includeNotebooks, setIncludeNotebooks] = useState(false) to ChatTab component. This state is only used when mode is 'user-controlled'.

title: Conditionally render checkbox based on mode
description: In ChatTab, add checkbox UI that only renders when isUserControlled() returns true. Checkbox should be labeled 'Include Notebooks' with book icon and helper text when checked.

title: Update handleSendMessage with mode-aware logic
description: Update handleSendMessage function to: (1) Select appropriate system prompt based on mode, (2) Set max_tokens based on whether notebooks are included, (3) Detect sources used in response, (4) Add console logging for debugging mode behavior.

title: Add data export functionality
description: Allow users to export chart data to CSV, Excel, and JSON formats

title: Update typing indicator for mode awareness
description: Modify typing indicator in ChatTab to show 'May be consulting notebooks...' when in user-controlled mode with checkbox checked, or when in auto-route mode.

title: Update source badge rendering with conditional display
description: Add source badges to assistant messages that only render when NOTEBOOK_LM_CONFIG.enableSourceBadges is true. Green badge for 'Institution Data', blue badge for 'Notebooks' with appropriate icons.

title: Update Message interface to include sources field
description: Add sources?: Array<'institution-data' | 'notebooks'> field to Message interface in ChatTab.tsx to track which knowledge sources were used for each response.

title: Test disabled mode functionality
description: Set mode to 'disabled' in config and verify: (1) Checkbox is hidden, (2) NotebookLM never consulted, (3) All responses use institution data only, (4) Fast response times (~2 sec).

title: Test user-controlled mode functionality
description: Set mode to 'user-controlled' and verify: (1) Checkbox is visible, (2) Unchecked = data only, (3) Checked = may include NotebookLM, (4) Source badges display correctly, (5) localStorage persistence works.

title: Test auto-route mode functionality
description: Set mode to 'auto-route' and verify: (1) Checkbox is hidden, (2) Quantitative questions use data only (fast), (3) Qualitative questions may consult NotebookLM (slower), (4) Claude makes appropriate routing decisions.

title: Update documentation with NotebookLM modes
description: Update README.md and AGENTS.md to document the three modes (disabled, user-controlled, auto-route), how to switch between them, and expected behavior for each mode.

title: Optimize chart rendering performance
description: Lazy load charts, implement virtualization for large datasets, and optimize re-renders

title: Add responsive design for mobile charts
description: Ensure all charts render properly on mobile devices with appropriate sizing and interactions

title: Handle null/missing data in charts
description: Some institutions have null WAC budgets or missing data causing rendering issues in ChartsView.tsx

title: Add chart legends and tooltips
description: Improve chart readability by adding better legends, tooltips with more context, and data labels

title: Implement chart animation and transitions
description: Add smooth animations when chart data updates or filters are applied

title: Add Chat functionality with program descriptions
